author: senh
title: You Get A Bill From National Grid: Scam Or Mix-Up?
text: BING NEWS: You Get A Bill From National Grid: Scam Or Mix-Up? Scam or profoundly misdirected bill? A Franklin couple receive a bill from an electricity supplier (National Grid) they don't know addressed to a business (Antique Realty Corp.) they don't know. "We are not and have never been a National Grid customer ... 07/2/2015 - 5:39 pm | View Link National Grid warns customers of bill scams, employee impersonators National Grid and local police departments have received an increasing number of calls from customers being targeted by billing scam artists and impersonators trying to gain access to account information and entry to peopleâ€™s homes. The bill scams mirror ... 01/14/2015 - 11:46 am | View Link National Grid Warns of Utility Bill Scam National Grid is warning its customers of a new, nationwide utility bill scam. In the past several days National Grid electric customers have received telephone calls from individuals claiming to work for National Grid. These scammers demand payment ... 12/10/2014 - 11:50 am | View Link National Grid warns of utility bill scammers New England customers of National Grid are being warned of a scam involving callers identifying themselves as National Grid representatives and demanding immediate payment of electric bills. Customers are being threatened with immediate termination of ... 01/28/2014 - 8:53 am | View Link National Grid, AG's office warn of utility billing scam National Grid and the Rhode Island attorney general's office are warning National Grid customers to beware of the latest utility billing scam.
